projects.name: Data Loss Prevention
projects.description: Cross-platform DLP agents (Windows/Linux) that watch file-system, clipboard, and PII events, forwarding everything in real time to a FastAPI backbone with PostgreSQL, Redis, and OpenSearch for policy checks and incident logging. Shipped as a Docker Compose stack for quick deploys.

projects.name: Legal Drafting System
projects.description: RAG legal assistant with two modes: upload a petition to pull case law and draft replies, or chat over a PGVector-indexed corpus of Indian judgments. Built ingestion for text + metadata, hybrid retrieval (vector + PostgreSQL FTS), LLM query planning, and context assembly; shipped with a Streamlit UI and multiple model backends (Ollama/OpenAI/OpenRouter).

projects.name: Sunshine Bot
projects.description: Voice assistant on a Twilio number that recognizes patients by phone and manages hospital appointments end-to-end via Google Calendar with a SQLite/Postgres cache. Handles booking, changes, and history with conflict-free, doctor-specific slots and TTS via ElevenLabs.

projects.name: Food Demand Forecasting
projects.description: Time-series pipeline to forecast food demand and cut waste. Built end-to-end MLOps with Kafka + PySpark for ingestion, DVC/MLflow for experiment tracking, and a Flask service to surface forecasts that improve inventory planning.

projects.name: Calpred
projects.description: Calorie-burn predictor from workout data with a web UI for real-time tracking and visual feedback. Trained with XGBoost/TPOT and packaged behind Flask with lightweight storage to keep users on top of their fitness goals.

projects.name: CozyReader
projects.description: AI bedtime storyteller that crafts personalized audio tales with custom characters, themes, and voices. Streamlit front-end with HuggingFace TTS voices and Google GenAI to keep bedtime engaging.
